name: Hold the line (itch)
description: Hold the line is a short game made during the Tromsø Game Jam 2017. Sticking to the theme "connections" this game is about physically connecting calls but also about making connections about the mystery as it unfolds. Set in a hotel during a global conference you are tasked with listening in on peoples phone-calls and trying to piece together information from their conversations in order to figure out who's who and what is going on. Can you save the world?
